item.title: About Version Control
item.description: Part 1 What is Version Control Version control (sometimes called source control) keeps track of changes to files over time.

item.title: Using GitHub to Manage Project Files
item.description: GitHub is a programing organization tool that not only can store all your programs nicely but allow you to collaborate with others on the same “repository” (or 304/314 project folder in layman’s terms).
